item.title: Fast & Furious 11 Is A Final Chance For The Franchise To Redeem My Favorite Character After The Fast Saga Ruined Him
item.description: Fast & Furious 11 will be the franchise's final chance to redeem an important character after the Fast Saga turned them into nothing but a joke.

item.title: Robert Pattinson's New Sci-Fi Movie Lands On Its First All-Time Box Office Charts Despite Underwhelming Opening Weekend
item.description: The new sci-fi satire starring Robert Pattinson as multiple versions of himself has become one of the highest-grossing dark comedies of all time.

item.title: How Many People Died During The EF5 Joplin Tornado In 2011
item.description: The Netflix documentary movie, The Twister: Caught in the Storm is about the Joplin tornado, which caused apocalyptic-level damage and killed many.
